rohitTitle: Rohit Azad - Senior Officer - Frontend Technology,   Sr. UI Consultant Developer

aboutText: I am Rohit Azad, a User Interface Developer. I create beautiful, usable, professional websites using best practice accessibility and familiar with clean, interactive, responsible Designs .
I like to work with passion for building cutting-edge, rich user interface with a nice coding standard and keep W3C web-standard in mind.
I Love my job and do it with Passion. And day by day I learn a lot of things and I am looking forward to growing even more.

stackAlt: profile for Rohit Azad at Stack Overflow, Q&A for professional and enthusiast programmers
